mapper.select: SELECT boardfunction.functionID, ifnull(functioncheck.companyID,0) as companyID, boardfunction.functionName, functioncheck.functionData FROM BoardFunction boardfunction LEFT OUTER JOIN FunctionCheck functioncheck ON boardfunction.functionID = functioncheck.functionID AND functioncheck.companyID = #{companyID};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FunctionCheck WHERE companyID = #{companyID} AND functionID = #{functionID};
